availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Orson Ames (Marion County, Kentucky, grocer and editor)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, editor. New York native. Married to Martha Ann Bell Ames in Jefferson County, Kentucky on March 30, 1835. Married to Elizabeth Lewis Ames in Jefferson County, Kentucky on December 26, 1854. Father of Virginia Ames, Samuel R. Ames, Eliza F. Ames, Edward Remington Ames, Leonard E. Ames, Maria L. Ames, Clarrissa E. Ames, James O. Ames, and T. Ellena Ames. Grocer in Marion County, Kentucky in 1850. Editor in Marion County, Kentucky in 1860.
